Articles.Content:
Hi guys,

If you haven't guessed, my name is Dan. Currently live near St. Louis, Missouri, USA. Just discovered this game a few weeks ago and am HOOKED! I actually studied Aerospace Engineering in college (and even graduated with that degree!) This game is basically what I dreamed my life would be like as a child, but alas, after a few short years working for LMSC, I had to make the move to IT (for the $$$). This game gives me the opportunity to exercise some of my rusty math and engineering skills and I LOVE IT!

I probably won't post a ton - I usually don't anyhow - but I'll probably be hanging around...

Happy Flying!!

Dan
Hi CrashTestDanny. Welcome to the forum.

Welcome!

I'm going into a degree in Aerospace Engineering, so meeting someone with that degree is an honor.
Good luck in pursuing your degree! What school are you attending?
Welcome aboard! I too am looking to go into Aerospace engineering. I am thinking about Embry- Riddle, Penn State, University of Maryland, and GW.
All good schools. I went to Arizona (Tucson - Go Wildcats!)
Hellloooooo there! Welcome to the forums, and enjoy your stay!
